title: 2013 Nordica Fire Arrow 84 Skis Review By Skis.com

asset.author: skisdotcom
asset.hookText: http://www.skis.com/Nordica-FireArrow-84-Skis-with-N-Pro-Evo-Bindings-2013/277162P,default,pd.html  The Nordica FireArrow 84 Skis are for those who head to the mountain to have the best time. It's all about fun and there's no limit on what you can achieve. With its Full Camber design you'll have a dynamic edge grip on your turns whether riding on powder or groomers. You'll have stability at all speeds and great turn initiative as well as rebound and edge grip. The N Pro Evo Bindings are wider for better control and can dramatically improve your balance. The Nordica FireArrow 84 Skis are a versatile ski that your can take over groomed trails, steeps, flats and everything in between for a fun-filled day on the mountain.
